channel.title: million on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in million on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-16
item.description: Bored Ape startup plans virtual land sales, APECoin token to kickstart metaverse gaming project (3 minute read) Yuga Labs is planning to build a gaming-focused metaverse called MetaRPG that will be compatible with a host of NFTs.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-09
item.description: Incredibly excited to share the launch of Avalanche Multiverse (Twitter thread) The Avalanche Foundation has launched Avalanche Multiverse, an up to $290 million incentive program focused on accelerating the adoption and growth of its subnet functionality.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: FTX Pledges Up to $1 Billion for Philanthropic Fund to ‘Improve Humanity’ (2 minute read) Cryptocurrency exchange FTX has announced an up to $1 billion fund for ambitious projects that improve humanity’s long-term prospects.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: “Reverse ISO” will see 20 million more SundaeSwap tokens given away (2 minute read) SundaeSwap, a decentralized exchange on the Cardano blockchain, launched on January 20 and soon became the leading Cardano DEX.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-03
item.description: Butterfly Protocol and Cortex Application are launching free new .hmn: Web3 for Everyone (2 minute read) Butterfly Protocol and Cortex Application are launching new ‘dot human’ domains on Polygon.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: DeepDAO Launches Search Engine to Find Financial, Membership Data for DAOs (3 minute read) DeepDAO has launched a search engine to help people find answers to the most common DAO-related questions.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Opera launches a dedicated crypto browser (2 minute read) Opera has launched a web3 Crypto Browser that features a built-in crypto wallet, easy access to exchanges, support for decentralized apps, a secure clipboard that other apps can’t view, and more.
